font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 穿越： to travel or pass across, over, or through
【例】 The spider traversed the wall from end to end. 蜘蛛侠攀岩走壁。
【近】 course, cover, cross, cut across, navigate, pass over, perambulate, peregrinate, proceed along, transit, travel
【记】 源自transverse 横向的, 横断的 tra = trans 穿越 + verse 翻转
【另】 cross
